dashboard.heroSubtitle: Estás a un paso de activar tu 401(k). Hemos simplificado todo para que puedas enfocarte en lo que importa.
dashboard.meetAdvisors: ¿Necesitas ayuda para elegir un plan? Conoce a nuestros asesores.
dashboard.employerMatchDesc: Dinero extra. Igualamos el 100% hasta el 6% de tu salario.
dashboard.taxAdvantagesDesc: Reduce tu ingreso imponible ahora o disfruta de retiros libres de impuestos después.
dashboard.compoundGrowthDesc: Empieza pronto. Incluso aportaciones pequeñas crecen mucho con el tiempo.
dashboard.advisor1Desc: Ayudando a los empleados a tomar decisiones de jubilación con confianza y orientación sencilla.
dashboard.advisor2Desc: CFP con experiencia que ofrece recomendaciones claras para profesionales ocupados.

demo.scenarioComingSoon: El panel para el escenario "{{scenario}}" estará disponible pronto.
demo.employerMatchCardDesc: Tu empleador igualará tus aportaciones. ¡No dejes dinero gratis sobre la mesa!
demo.enrollmentStatusDesc: Puedes comenzar tu ahorro para la jubilación hoy.
demo.autoEnrollmentDescActive: Te inscribiremos automáticamente en 30 días si no actúas.
demo.readyToStartDesc: A los {{age}} años, empezar ahora te da más de {{years}} años de crecimiento compuesto. Incluso una pequeña aportación puede crecer mucho con el tiempo.

preEnrollment.learnSubtitle: Guías breves y sencillas para ayudarte a tomar decisiones informadas.
preEnrollment.needGuidanceSubtitle: Los robots son buenos para los números, pero a veces necesitas hablar con una persona. Nuestro equipo no trabaja a comisión y está aquí para ayudarte.

transactions.title: Actividad de jubilación
transactions.subtitle: Tu actividad de jubilación e información de transacciones.

withdrawal.mayBeEligible: Based on your vested balance, you may be eligible for a hardship or in-service withdrawal.
withdrawal.taxPenaltyWarning: Hardship withdrawals may be subject to income tax and a 10% early withdrawal penalty if under 59½.
withdrawal.federalWithholdingNote: Federal withholding is typically 20% for early distributions. You may elect a different rate.
withdrawal.impactLow: This withdrawal has limited impact on your projected balance. Consider resuming or increasing contributions when possible.
withdrawal.impactMedium: This amount reduces your invested balance. Tax and penalty may apply; review withholding and consider timing.
withdrawal.impactHigh: This is a significant withdrawal. Ensure you understand tax, penalty, and long-term impact on retirement goals.
withdrawal.timelineRequestReceivedDetail: We'll verify eligibility and process your hardship withdrawal.
withdrawal.timelineTaxWithholdingDetail: Federal ({{federal}}%) and state ({{state}}%) withholding will be applied per your election.
withdrawal.timelineDisbursementDetail: Net amount will be sent via your chosen method (typically 5–10 business days).
withdrawal.understandTaxPenalties: I understand the tax implications and penalties that may apply.

transactions.processedMessage: This transaction is being processed. You can view details but cannot make changes.
transactions.completedMessage: This transaction has been completed. You can view details and documents.

loan.eligibleTitle: You are eligible for a 401(k) loan
loan.eligibleDesc: You can borrow up to {{max}} based on your vested balance.
loan.outstandingLoanDesc: You have an outstanding loan. Repay it before taking a new one.
loan.lowBalanceDesc: Your vested balance is below the minimum required.
loan.residentialNote: Residential loans may require a Purchase Agreement and can extend up to 15 years in some plans.
loan.advisorNoteConservative: This conservative amount keeps your long-term wealth projection highly stable.
loan.advisorNoteBalanced: This amount is balanced. Ensure your repayment plan fits your monthly budget comfortably.
loan.advisorNoteSignificant: This loan represents a significant portion of your balance. Consider a shorter tenure to replenish funds faster.
loan.tenureLongDesc: Extending to {{years}} years lowers your monthly payment but increases total interest.
loan.tenureShortDesc: Choosing {{years}} years saves you money on interest but requires higher monthly payments.
loan.reviewDisbursement: Review disbursement details and how you will receive funds.
loan.checkMailedNote: Check will be mailed to your address on file within 7–10 business days.
loan.impactLow: This loan amount has minimal impact on your projected retirement balance. Repayments will replenish your account over the term.
loan.impactMedium: This loan reduces invested balance during the term. Repayments will restore growth; consider keeping tenure as short as comfortable.
loan.impactHigh: This loan uses a significant portion of your balance. Shorter tenure will help restore growth sooner.
loan.timelineReceivedDetail: We'll review your request and verify disbursement details.
loan.timelineDisbursementEft: Funds sent to your bank (typically 2–3 business days).
loan.timelineDisbursementCheck: Check mailed to your address on file (7–10 business days).
loan.timelineRepaymentDetail: First payment will be deducted per your selected frequency after disbursement.
loan.agreeTerms: I agree to the loan terms and authorize the deduction from my account.
loan.taxNote: Loan repayments are made with after-tax dollars. Interest is not tax-deductible.
loan.confirmReviewDetails: I confirm that I have reviewed all details and understand the terms of this loan.
loan.complianceReadOnlyNote: Promissory Note, Truth in Lending, and Spousal Consent acknowledged.
loan.complianceIntro: Please read and acknowledge the following before continuing. All are required to submit your loan request.
loan.promissoryNoteText: I agree to repay this loan according to the terms and schedule. I understand that default may result in the loan being treated as a distribution and subject to taxes and penalties.
loan.truthInLendingText: I have received and understand the required disclosures, including the APR, finance charge, and payment schedule.
loan.spousalConsentText: If required by the plan, my spouse has been informed and consents to this loan.

placeholder.withdrawalAmount: Withdrawal amount selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.withdrawalTax: Tax information and withholding options will be implemented here.
placeholder.withdrawalReview: Review your withdrawal details and submit your application.
placeholder.distributionEligibility: Distribution application eligibility check will be implemented here.
placeholder.distributionAmount: Distribution amount selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.distributionTax: Tax withholding options will be implemented here.
placeholder.distributionReview: Review your distribution details and submit your application.
placeholder.rolloverEligibility: Rollover application eligibility check will be implemented here.
placeholder.rolloverAmount: Rollover amount selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.rolloverDestination: Destination account selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.rolloverReview: Review your rollover details and submit your application.
placeholder.transferEligibility: Transfer application eligibility check will be implemented here.
placeholder.transferDetails: Transfer details will be implemented here.
placeholder.transferInvestment: Investment selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.transferReview: Review your transfer details and submit your application.
placeholder.rebalanceEligibility: Rebalance application eligibility check will be implemented here.
placeholder.rebalanceCurrent: Current allocation review will be implemented here.
placeholder.rebalanceTarget: Target allocation selection will be implemented here.
placeholder.rebalanceReview: Review your rebalance details and submit your application.
placeholder.irreversibleWarning: This transaction cannot be undone once submitted. Please review all details carefully.
placeholder.summaryPlaceholder: Summary and warnings will be displayed here.
placeholder.confirmReviewedTerms: I confirm that I have reviewed all details and understand the terms of this transaction.

rollover.canConsolidate: You can consolidate your retirement accounts
rollover.rolloverDesc: Roll over funds from a previous 401(k) or IRA to simplify management and potentially reduce fees.
rollover.approximateFromPlan: Approximate amount from your previous plan or IRA
rollover.impactLow: Consolidating this amount can simplify management. Funds will be invested per your allocation.
rollover.impactMedium: This rollover will meaningfully increase your balance here. Direct rollover avoids tax and penalty.
rollover.impactHigh: This is a substantial rollover. Once received, funds will be invested according to your current allocation.
rollover.timelineRequestReceivedDetail: We'll send you instructions and any required forms for your prior provider.
rollover.timelineTransferDetail: You request a direct rollover from your previous 401(k) or IRA to this plan.
rollover.timelineFundsReceivedDetail: Once we receive the funds, they will be invested per your allocation (typically 5–10 business days).
rollover.confirmDirectRollover: I confirm that I am initiating a direct rollover and understand the process.

transfer.rebalanceDesc: Rebalancing helps keep your portfolio aligned with your goals and risk tolerance.
transfer.chooseIntent: Choose your reallocation intent. This helps us suggest an appropriate allocation.
transfer.currentAllocationNote: Current allocation (for reference). Changes will be applied at next market close.
transfer.understandNextClose: I understand that reallocation will take effect at the next market close.

analysis.irreversibleWarning: This transaction is irreversible. Once completed, it cannot be undone.
analysis.explanationLoan: You're borrowing from your 401(k) account. The loan amount is deducted from your balance, and you'll repay it with interest through payroll deductions over the loan term. Interest payments go back into your account.
analysis.explanationWithdrawal: You're taking an early withdrawal from your 401(k). This permanently reduces your retirement savings. Withdrawals are subject to income tax and may incur a 10% early withdrawal penalty if you're under age 59½.
analysis.explanationDistribution: You're receiving a distribution from your 401(k). This permanently reduces your retirement balance. Distributions are subject to income tax, and required minimum distributions (RMDs) are mandatory starting at age 73.
analysis.explanationRollover: You're moving funds from this 401(k) to another qualified retirement account. Rollovers preserve your retirement savings and maintain tax-deferred status when completed within 60 days or as a direct transfer.
analysis.explanationTransfer: You're transferring investments between accounts. This allows you to move funds while maintaining your investment strategy and tax-deferred status.
analysis.explanationRebalance: You're rebalancing your portfolio to adjust your investment allocation. This helps maintain your target asset allocation and manage risk over time.

auth.pickPersona: Elige una persona para explorar el portal
auth.verificationCodeDesc: Hemos enviado un código de 6 dígitos a tu correo.
auth.verificationCodeDescWithEmail: Hemos enviado un código de 6 dígitos a {{email}}. Ingrésalo abajo.
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Ingresa tu correo y te enviaremos un enlace para restablecer tu contraseña.
auth.helpCenterDesc: Si tienes problemas para iniciar sesión, contáctanos:
auth.resetPasswordDesc: Tu contraseña debe tener al menos 8 caracteres e incluir letras, números y caracteres especiales.

enrollment.managementDescription: View and manage your retirement plan enrollments
enrollment.noPlansFound: No plans found matching the selected filter.
enrollment.selectPlanSubtitle: Choose an option to see how it affects your future savings.
enrollment.needHelpDeciding: Need help deciding? Our advisors are available to discuss which plan is right for your financial goals.
enrollment.selectPlanToSeeDetails: Select a plan to see details.
enrollment.planNotAvailableDefault: This plan is not available for your current profile.
enrollment.bestForTaxFree: Best for tax-free growth over time.
enrollment.solidOption: A solid option for your retirement savings.
enrollment.excellentTaxFree: Excellent for growing your money tax-free.
enrollment.betterPaycheck: Better for keeping more money in your paycheck today.
enrollment.conNoTaxBreakToday: You don't get a tax break today
enrollment.conPayTaxesWithdraw: You pay taxes when you take money out
enrollment.planTraditional401kDesc: Contributions are made with pre-tax dollars, reducing your taxable income now. You'll pay taxes when you withdraw in retirement.
enrollment.planRoth401kDesc: Contributions are after-tax. Withdrawals in retirement are tax-free.
enrollment.planSafeHarborDesc: Employer contributions are immediately vested. No annual testing required.
enrollment.designSavingsSubtitle: Small increases today can create life-changing impact tomorrow.
enrollment.howMuchContribute: How much do you want to contribute?
enrollment.futureContributionsSubtitle: Small increases each year can create significant long-term impact.
enrollment.enableAutoIncreaseDesc: Your contribution will increase slightly once per year. You can change this anytime.
enrollment.withAnnualIncrease: With a {{percent}}% annual increase, you could accumulate
enrollment.moreByAge: more by age {{age}}. That's an additional
enrollment.assumesReturn: Assumes {{rate}}% annual return. Actual results may vary.
enrollment.reviewSubtitle: Here's what your future could look like based on today's decisions.
enrollment.strongPath: Based on your current selections, you're on a strong path. Small adjustments today can have outsized impact over {{years}} years of compounding growth.
enrollment.autoIncreaseNotConfigured: Automatic annual increase is not configured.
enrollment.acceptTerms: Please accept the terms to enable enrollment.
enrollment.contributionsStartDesc: Deductions begin on the first payroll cycle following the 15th of next month.
enrollment.processingTimeDesc: Takes 1–2 pay periods to reflect on your pay stub.
enrollment.modifyAnytimeDesc: Change your contribution rate or investment elections at any time.
enrollment.goToContributions: Go to Contributions to apply this change.
enrollment.goToInvestments: Go to Investment Elections to apply this change.
enrollment.portfolioStability: Your portfolio favors stability with measured growth potential.
enrollment.portfolioGrowth: Your portfolio is positioned for higher growth with greater market exposure.
enrollment.insightsFromPlanData: Insights generated from your plan data.
enrollment.contributionsBeginNextPaycheck: Your contributions will begin with your next paycheck.
enrollment.completeAllSections: Complete all sections and accept terms to activate.
enrollment.insightIncreasePreTaxDesc: Adding 2% more to your pre-tax contribution could close approximately 40% of any projected shortfall.
enrollment.insightTargetDate: Simplify with a Target Date Fund
enrollment.insightTargetDateDesc: A single Target Retirement Fund automatically adjusts risk as you approach retirement age.
enrollment.investmentElectionsSubtitle: Choose how your contributions are invested.
enrollment.balanceGrowthStability: Balance growth and stability based on your risk comfort.

profile.pageDescription: Administra tu información personal, datos laborales y configuración de la cuenta.
profile.confirmSwitchSection: Tienes cambios sin guardar. ¿Seguro que quieres cambiar de sección?
